attributes.description:
So stunning it’s a bit unfair!!
As you sit in the driver’s seat, you’ll find plenty of adjustment and movement in the seat and steering wheel to ensure drivers of all sizes find a great driving position.

Experience agile and intuitive driving with the compact multifunction steering wheel  , the configurable 3D head-up display  , the large 10" touchscreen   and the 7 "piano" toggle switches. You can also personalize your interior environment with a choice of 8 RGB LED colours   for an even more up-to-date look.

attributes.description: A compact SUV, the PEUGEOT 2008 is an assertive proposition. It provides an unparalleled dynamic performance and a unique and addictive driving experience. The driver enjoys an intuitive, agile, flexible and safe driving experience. The Grip Control, an adapted traction system, is available in the petrol and Diesel version, in manual or automatic.  On-board connectivity includes the Mirror Screen feature which allows the driver to link their MirrorLinkTM or Apple Carplay® compatible smartphone to the touch screen.

attributes.description: The Peugeot 208 may be supermini-sized on the outside, but space inside is generous enough for both passengers and luggage, in fact it’s a real design gem! Bursting with tasteful touches throughout the car from its leather wrapped “racing” steering wheel to its beautifully appointed I-cockpit, a 7” touchscreen infotainment system, bright LED daytime running lights and zippy engine, it’s fun to drive, and…sips fuel!

For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Last Service - 16/03/2022 @85964km
Full Service History

The Renault Sandero comes with a strong and reliable Turbocharged engine that pushes out 66kW of power which makes it nifty on the road. In terms of safety features you get ABS, ESC, ESP, ASR and ISOFIX childseat anchors. Other notable features include electric front windows, multi-functioning steering wheel as well as Bluetooth connectivity. This vehicle is perfect for city driving and saving costs on fuel, with a fuel consumption of 5.2l/100km. Great value for money. Book your test drive today.

Trade ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.
